channel.title: goals on Jeremy Kao
channel.description: Recent content in goals on Jeremy Kao

item.title: On Goal Setting and Why it Ain't it
item.description: As with many folks who've been stuck in the house for the past few months, I've been a lot more attentive to my feelings. Deep down, I know I'm dissatisfied with some things in my life, but it's been extremely difficult to pinpoint exactly what I need to change. So I've been analyzing and reflecting on my past, thinking about moments that brought me joy, specific events that made me anxious, specific annoyances at work, etc.
